formConfig.yaml:
apiVersion: kubesmart.smtx.io/v1alpha1
kind: KubeSmartCluster
metadata:
  name: ""
  namespace: default
  annotations:
    sks-display-name: ""
spec:
  controlPlaneEndpoint:
    host: ""
    port: 6443
  network:
    cni:
      name: calico
    services:
      cidrBlocks:
      - "10.96.0.0/22"
    pods:
      cidrBlocks:
      - "172.16.0.0/16"
  storage:
    csi:
      elf: {}
      zbs: null
      stub: null
      name: 'elf'
  components:
    logging:
      enabled: false
    monitoring:
      enabled: false
    ingress:
      enabled: false
    loadbalancer:
      enabled: false
    externaldns:
      enabled: false
  cloudProvider:
    name: cloudtower
    cloudtower:
      server: ""
      authMode:
      username: ""
      password: ""
      elfCluster:
      elfVlan:
      elfVmTemplate: ""
      zbsVip: ""
      cloudtowerServer:
        secretRef:
          name: "cloudtower-server"
          namespace: "default"
  # optional cluster configuration          
  clusterConfiguration:
    customImageRegistry: "{{ deploy_registry_manager.registry.hostname }}/sks"
    security:
      sshAuthorizedPublicKey: ""
      sshPassword: ""
---
apiVersion: custom/v1
kind: Custom
nameservers: 
  - ""
businessNetwork:
  vlan: ""
  networkType: "IPV4_DHCP"
iomeshNetwork:
  vlan: ""
ecpNetwork:
  vlan: ""
  cidr: ""
  subnet: ""
  gateway: ""
controlPlaneEndpointNetworkType: "MANUAL"
controlPlane:
  name: "controlplane"
  replicas: 1
  nodeConfig:
    cpuCores: 4
    memoryMB: 8192
    memoryGB: 8
    diskSizeGB: 100
    cloneMode: FastClone
    network:
      devices: 
workers:
- name: ""
  replicas: 1
  nodeConfig:
    cpuCores: 4
    memoryMB: 8196
    memoryGB: 8
    diskSizeGB: 100
    cloneMode: FastClone
    network:
      devices:
